issue.title: [Python] unify_schema should accept tuples too
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14002](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14002). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Calling `unify_schemas` with a tuple fails, but there is no good reason why we shouldn't support it and restrict argument to only lists.

```Java

TypeError: Argument 'schemas' has incorrect type (expected list, got tuple)
```
